title: SS.PT.379
prompt: Based on the information in the passage about the Jamaican slave trade, what is likely to be true about the Brazilian slave trade?
description: The largest population of Africans in the Western Hemisphere is in Brazil, where the population is 38.5% biracial (over 72 million) and 6.2% black (over 11 million).
feedback: The passage shows a relationship between the number of African slaves during slavery and the black population today. Many African slaves equates to a large percentage of blacks in the population today. Since Brazil has a large black population today, Brazil likely had a large number of African slaves.
